title.rendered: CONGRATULATION SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF HANOI ADELAIDE SCHOOL PROJECT

content.rendered:
Commenced at the end of 2020, Hanoi Adelaide School (H.A.S) Project Team is being completed its taking final steps to bring the project to successful completion. successfully achieve the finish line by Site Management team.

In this project, Newtecons has been trusted by the Client to take the role of accompanied the investor under the role of a General contractor, doing all of foundation, superstructure, finishing, MEP and landscape works. From the beginning, the Ssite Mmanagement Tteam has always determined to achieve targets in terms of obtain the safety, punctuality and quality to make this project become of the project to create a modern facility building which servinges the educational mission. It would become career and becomes the best place for the development of students from primary school to through high school to develop.

Located at Duong Noi Ward, Ha Dong District, Hanoi, city, H.A.S this building respects the harmony with nature. It has thean open yard and garden with lots of trees. The green space will helps students connect towith the nature, foster creativity and inspiration among studentsraise studying inspiration and strongly develop potential creativity. Witnessing Seeing thegradual completion of every classroom, functional room, landscape, etc …made the team feel so happy and proud. is the Site Management team’s happiness and pride.
